oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unidentified and incomplete grañth: text begins with part 10 and terminates with part 145 ; each part, individually titled, consists of 13 rythming couplets and a dohā.
Title page containing publication information missing, pp. 1-18 and all after p. 290 missing.
Hardboard cloth-covers; binding in good condition.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
